metadata.title: CVE-2020-24371 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
lgc.c in Lua 5.4.0 mishandles the interaction between barriers and the sweep phase, leading to a memory access violation involving collectgarbage.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-24371` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.1-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
